name: LegacyXperia Project
body:
### Welcome to LegacyXperia Project homepage.
LegacyXperia Project is offering unofficial builds of CyanogenMod for legacy Sony Ericsson msm7x30 devices. It is an effort to join all developer forces to bring a stable rom on these devices which are dropped from official CM after cm-10.

### Supported devices:
Currently only mogami devices are supported. Support for zeus devices is in progress.

List of supported devices:
* Xperia Arc/Arc S (anzu)
* Live with Walkman (coconut)
* Xperia Neo V (haida)
* Xperia Neo (hallon)
* Xperia Pro (iyokan)
* Xperia Mini Pro (mango)
* Xperia Active (satsuma)
* Xperia Mini (smultron)
* Xperia Ray (urushi)

### Useful links:
* [Downloads](http://legacyxperia.basketbuild.com/)
* [Github sources](https://github.com/LegacyXperia)
* [Bug tracker](https://github.com/LegacyXperia/local_manifests/issues?state=open)
* [Wiki](https://github.com/LegacyXperia/Wiki/wiki)
* [Release changelog](https://github.com/LegacyXperia/local_manifests/wiki/Changelog)
* [Official CyanogenMod changelog for cm-10.1](http://review.cyanogenmod.org/#/q/status:merged+branch:cm-10.1,n,z)
* [Working/not working list of cm-10.1](https://github.com/LegacyXperia/local_manifests/wiki/CM10.1-kernel-3.4-status)
* [xda thread for cm-10.1](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2464859)
* [Official CyanogenMod changelog for cm-10.2](http://review.cyanogenmod.org/#/q/status:merged+branch:cm-10.2,n,z)
* [Working/not working list of cm-10.2](https://github.com/LegacyXperia/local_manifests/wiki/CM10.2-kernel-3.4-status)
* [xda thread for cm-10.2](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2466097)
* [Official CyanogenMod changelog for cm-11.0](http://review.cyanogenmod.org/#/q/status:merged+branch:cm-11.0,n,z)
* [Working/not working list of cm-11.0](https://github.com/LegacyXperia/local_manifests/wiki/CM11.0-kernel-3.4-status)
* [xda thread for cm-11.0](http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2543426)
